list.name: passenger_id
list.label: Passenger
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE customer_id != '' ORDER BY customer_id LIMIT 500
list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE customer_id != '' ORDER BY customer_id LIMIT 500

list.name: flight_id
list.label: Flight (optional)
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT flight_id FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE customer_id = '$passenger_id' ORDER BY flight_id
list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT flight_id FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE customer_id = '$passenger_id' ORDER BY flight_id

targets.query: SELECT count() AS value FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE customer_id = '$passenger_id' AND ('$flight_id' = '__all' OR flight_id = '$flight_id')
targets.rawSql: SELECT count() AS value FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE customer_id = '$passenger_id' AND ('$flight_id' = '__all' OR flight_id = '$flight_id')

targets.query: SELECT round(100 * countIf(event_type = 'LoadedOnAircraft') / nullIf(count(),0), 1) AS value FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE customer_id = '$passenger_id' AND ('$flight_id' = '__all' OR flight_id = '$flight_id')
targets.rawSql: SELECT round(100 * countIf(event_type = 'LoadedOnAircraft') / nullIf(count(),0), 1) AS value FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE customer_id = '$passenger_id' AND ('$flight_id' = '__all' OR flight_id = '$flight_id')

targets.query: SELECT round(100 * countIf(event_type = 'CarouselArrived') / nullIf(count(),0), 1) AS value FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE customer_id = '$passenger_id' AND ('$flight_id' = '__all' OR flight_id = '$flight_id')
targets.rawSql: SELECT round(100 * countIf(event_type = 'CarouselArrived') / nullIf(count(),0), 1) AS value FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE customer_id = '$passenger_id' AND ('$flight_id' = '__all' OR flight_id = '$flight_id')

targets.query: WITH stage_data AS ( SELECT CASE WHEN event_type = 'CheckedIn' THEN 'checked_in' WHEN event_type IN ('Inducted','ScreenedCleared','MakeupArrived') THEN 'in_transit' WHEN event_type = 'LoadedOnAircraft' THEN 'on_plane' WHEN event_type IN ('Offloaded','CarouselArrived') THEN 'arrived' ELSE 'other' END AS stage FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE customer_id = '$passenger_id' AND ('$flight_id' = '__all' OR flight_id = '$flight_id') ) SELECT countIf(stage = 'checked_in') AS checked_in, countIf(stage = 'in_transit') AS in_transit, countIf(stage = 'on_plane') AS on_plane, countIf(stage = 'arrived') AS arrived, countIf(stage = 'other') AS other FROM stage_data
targets.rawSql: WITH stage_data AS ( SELECT CASE WHEN event_type = 'CheckedIn' THEN 'checked_in' WHEN event_type IN ('Inducted','ScreenedCleared','MakeupArrived') THEN 'in_transit' WHEN event_type = 'LoadedOnAircraft' THEN 'on_plane' WHEN event_type IN ('Offloaded','CarouselArrived') THEN 'arrived' ELSE 'other' END AS stage FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE customer_id = '$passenger_id' AND ('$flight_id' = '__all' OR flight_id = '$flight_id') ) SELECT countIf(stage = 'checked_in') AS checked_in, countIf(stage = 'in_transit') AS in_transit, countIf(stage = 'on_plane') AS on_plane, countIf(stage = 'arrived') AS arrived, countIf(stage = 'other') AS other FROM stage_data

targets.query: SELECT stage, count() AS bags FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN event_type = 'CheckedIn' THEN 'checked_in' WHEN event_type IN ('Inducted','ScreenedCleared','MakeupArrived') THEN 'in_transit' WHEN event_type = 'LoadedOnAircraft' THEN 'on_plane' WHEN event_type IN ('Offloaded','CarouselArrived') THEN 'arrived' ELSE 'other' END AS stage FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE customer_id = '$passenger_id' AND ('$flight_id' = '__all' OR flight_id = '$flight_id') ) GROUP BY stage ORDER BY bags DESC
targets.rawSql: SELECT stage, count() AS bags FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN event_type = 'CheckedIn' THEN 'checked_in' WHEN event_type IN ('Inducted','ScreenedCleared','MakeupArrived') THEN 'in_transit' WHEN event_type = 'LoadedOnAircraft' THEN 'on_plane' WHEN event_type IN ('Offloaded','CarouselArrived') THEN 'arrived' ELSE 'other' END AS stage FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE customer_id = '$passenger_id' AND ('$flight_id' = '__all' OR flight_id = '$flight_id') ) GROUP BY stage ORDER BY bags DESC

targets.query: SELECT bag_id, flight_id, stage, airport, event_type, event_time FROM ( SELECT bag_id, flight_id, airport, event_type, event_time, CASE WHEN event_type = 'CheckedIn' THEN 'checked_in' WHEN event_type IN ('Inducted','ScreenedCleared','MakeupArrived') THEN 'in_transit' WHEN event_type = 'LoadedOnAircraft' THEN 'on_plane' WHEN event_type IN ('Offloaded','CarouselArrived') THEN 'arrived' ELSE 'other' END AS stage FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE customer_id = '$passenger_id' AND ('$flight_id' = '__all' OR flight_id = '$flight_id') ) ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 300
targets.rawSql: SELECT bag_id, flight_id, stage, airport, event_type, event_time FROM ( SELECT bag_id, flight_id, airport, event_type, event_time, CASE WHEN event_type = 'CheckedIn' THEN 'checked_in' WHEN event_type IN ('Inducted','ScreenedCleared','MakeupArrived') THEN 'in_transit' WHEN event_type = 'LoadedOnAircraft' THEN 'on_plane' WHEN event_type IN ('Offloaded','CarouselArrived') THEN 'arrived' ELSE 'other' END AS stage FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE customer_id = '$passenger_id' AND ('$flight_id' = '__all' OR flight_id = '$flight_id') ) ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 300

targets.query: SELECT itinerary_id, journey_state, latest_event, latest_event_time, connection_airport, risk_reason FROM baggage.itinerary_status WHERE itinerary_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT itinerary_id FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE customer_id = '$passenger_id' AND ('$flight_id' = '__all' OR flight_id = '$flight_id')) ORDER BY latest_event_time DESC LIMIT 50
targets.rawSql: SELECT itinerary_id, journey_state, latest_event, latest_event_time, connection_airport, risk_reason FROM baggage.itinerary_status WHERE itinerary_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT itinerary_id FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE customer_id = '$passenger_id' AND ('$flight_id' = '__all' OR flight_id = '$flight_id')) ORDER BY latest_event_time DESC LIMIT 50

targets.query: SELECT toStartOfInterval(event_time, INTERVAL 1 minute) AS ts, count() AS events FROM baggage.bag_events WHERE customer_id = '$passenger_id' AND ('$flight_id' = '__all' OR flight_id = '$flight_id') AND event_time >= $__timeFrom() AND event_time <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY ts ORDER BY ts
targets.rawSql: SELECT toStartOfInterval(event_time, INTERVAL 1 minute) AS ts, count() AS events FROM baggage.bag_events WHERE customer_id = '$passenger_id' AND ('$flight_id' = '__all' OR flight_id = '$flight_id') AND event_time >= $__timeFrom() AND event_time <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY ts ORDER BY ts
